meredith_grey is asleep in the shower with a toothbrush. meredith_grey wakes up when her arm slips and continues showering.

Later, meredith_grey visits the nursing home where her mother lives. meredith_grey talks about having her mother sign everything over while her mother is still clear-minded. meredith_grey watches her mother through the glass and mentions she hasn't slept in 48 hours. meredith_grey is about to perform heart surgery for the first time, is missing rounds, and asks if someone else can handle the situation. The nursing home representative explains they are discussing meredith_grey's mother's estate, finances, and medical care, questioning if meredith_grey wants to leave these responsibilities to someone else.

In the operating room, preston_burke is stitching while meredith_grey holds a heart. meredith_grey starts to nod off, and preston_burke notices her waking up suddenly. preston_burke questions meredith_grey, and she apologizes, saying the heart slipped. preston_burke tells meredith_grey she can release mrs_patterson's heart now. As they prepare to take the patient off bypass, george_omalley and cristina_yang watch from the gallery. george_omalley feels jealous because meredith_grey got to hold a heart. cristina_yang believes a monkey could hold a heart. george_omalley thinks cristina_yang feels this way because preston_burke didn't ask her to assist.

izzie_stevens enters looking for george_omalley, saying she needs more ice and chips. george_omalley is surprised and asks how many people izzie_stevens invited. cristina_yang repeats the invite list was for 'jocks only,' meaning surgery, trauma, and plastics. izzie_stevens mentions she invited some people from pediatrics too, whom cristina_yang calls preschoolers. cristina_yang jokes that shrinks are next, and when izzie_stevens turns away, cristina_yang realizes izzie_stevens already invited them and says the party is already dead on arrival. george_omalley reminds izzie_stevens that meredith_grey thinks it's a small, meet-your-boyfriend, cocktail event and asks if izzie_stevens checked with meredith_grey first. izzie_stevens admits she didn't but promises she will. cristina_yang questions why izzie_stevens is spending the one weekend her boyfriend is in town on a party and assumes it's because the boyfriend is bad in bed. izzie_stevens denies this and says she just wants him to meet her friends. cristina_yang is paged away despite her doubts. alex_karev arrives and asks about a party at Meredith's house, taking cristina_yang's seat. cristina_yang, george_omalley, and izzie_stevens deny any party while alex_karev watches the surgery below.

In the operating room, an alarm sounds, but the issue is unclear. The anesthesiologist informs preston_burke that the patient's temperature is rising as they massage the heart. preston_burke expects the heart to function on its own by now, but the patient flatlines. They continue compressions, and preston_burke uses paddles to shock the patient twice, restoring a rhythm. preston_burke praises the team and leaves to scrub out.

meredith_grey notices her fingernail has punctured her glove and worries she might have caused a problem. derek_shepherd, while eating, approaches meredith_grey and asks about the surgery. meredith_grey becomes less enthusiastic when george_omalley joins them. derek_shepherd notices meredith_grey's change in attitude. When the elevator arrives, george_omalley and meredith_grey get on, leaving derek_shepherd behind. meredith_grey tells george_omalley she might have done something to the heart while holding it. meredith_grey admits she nodded off and might have squeezed it. george_omalley reassures meredith_grey, saying the heart is a tough muscle. meredith_grey mentions her fingernail popped a glove and worries she might have punctured the heart. george_omalley explains that if meredith_grey had punctured it, they would have known during reperfusion. george_omalley assures meredith_grey the heart started again, so the patient is okay. meredith_grey considers telling preston_burke. george_omalley questions what there is to tell since nothing happened and the patient is fine. meredith_grey and george_omalley both continue to reassure each other that the patient is okay.

richard_webber, miranda_bailey, and george_omalley are looking at chest X-rays for mrs_drake. miranda_bailey asks george_omalley for his observations. george_omalley notes that the lungs are hyperinflated, cloudy with bullae, and have reduced capacity. george_omalley believes mrs_drake is likely having breathing difficulties. miranda_bailey inquires about george_omalley's next steps, and george_omalley suggests a bullectomy to relieve pressure. richard_webber mentions they operated on mrs_drake in 1999. Despite her previous surgery, george_omalley needs to explain the procedure to mrs_drake and avoid anti-smoking lectures, as she already feels guilty. As george_omalley leaves, he wonders if putting lung scans on cigarette packs would deter smoking.

derek_shepherd and alex_karev are with a patient who has back pain. alex_karev asks the patient how long the pain has persisted. The patient describes the pain as chronic, meaning it is constant. alex_karev acknowledges understanding "chronic" and requests more details about the pain type. The patient describes the pain as feeling like a thousand swords stabbing his spine. The patient mentions being allergic to aspirin and most NSAIDs. alex_karev suggests using morphine, but the patient insists that only Demerol or Dilaudid work. derek_shepherd notices track marks on the patient's arm.

Outside the room, alex_karev thinks the patient is seeking drugs. alex_karev believes the patient exaggerated the pain and calls him a junkie. derek_shepherd asks alex_karev what he would do. alex_karev wants to check the patient's history, refer him to a program, and discharge him. derek_shepherd agrees but insists alex_karev must first give the patient something for the pain. alex_karev is frustrated, thinking that's what the patient wants. derek_shepherd explains they must treat the pain as real and that the first rule of pain management is to be cautious. derek_shepherd instructs alex_karev to start a central line, noting the patient's veins are damaged, and then derek_shepherd is paged away.

mrs_drake mentioned to george_omalley that her last surgery was meant to help, but it never felt right. george_omalley suggested quitting smoking might have been wise. mrs_drake retorted that she had a 4-pack-a-day habit, quit, and it was very difficult, but it didn't help. george_omalley was surprised and said mrs_drake's scans made them think she still smoked. mrs_drake confirmed she quit cold turkey 5 years ago as they prepared her for surgery. mrs_drake shared that she had to leave her restaurant job because even sitting was painful, but no one believed her. george_omalley assured mrs_drake he saw the films and it wasn't just in her head. mrs_drake asked george_omalley to come closer and remarked he seemed too young to be a doctor. george_omalley replied he was older than he looked. mrs_drake inquired if the procedure would work this time, and george_omalley said it was her best option. mrs_drake appreciated george_omalley's straightforwardness.

meredith_grey observes as tyler helps mrs_patterson settle into the hospital bed. meredith_grey then talks to mr_patterson to get an update on mrs_patterson's condition. meredith_grey assures mr_patterson that mrs_patterson's levels are stable and explains that heart surgery is very demanding. meredith_grey tells mr_patterson they are keeping a close watch on mrs_patterson, and she should recover well.

izzie_stevens closes the curtain and approaches mr_sterman, asking about his condition. mr_sterman replies that he feels okay but doesn't want another bowel obstruction. izzie_stevens jokes that many people request them and checks if mr_sterman is managing clear fluids and using the bathroom. mr_sterman hesitates, so izzie_stevens asks if he's passed gas. mr_sterman lies and says yes, but izzie_stevens knows he's not truthful. mr_sterman apologizes and reveals he attended medical school but left during his final year of clinical training. mr_sterman worked too many hours and was going through a divorce. Now, mr_sterman does research and has a family. mr_sterman apologizes, saying he meant no offense. izzie_stevens assures mr_sterman it's fine. izzie_stevens believes one can have both a successful career and a family. mr_sterman doubts this, thinking a doctor's first responsibility is to their patient.

As izzie_stevens leaves Mr. Sterman's room, preston_burke approaches cristina_yang at the nurse's station and gives her a coffee. cristina_yang looks at preston_burke, confused, while preston_burke sips his own. preston_burke explains it's just coffee. cristina_yang awkwardly accepts it, and they part ways. As cristina_yang turns the corner, preston_burke watches her with a smile.
meredith_grey is washing her face in the locker room.

richard_webber is doing a 'spaghetti procedure' on mrs_drake. miranda_bailey explains the procedure to george_omalley. george_omalley and miranda_bailey notice something unusual, surprising miranda_bailey. richard_webber decides to switch to an open procedure and removes the scopes. richard_webber makes an incision while miranda_bailey assists. richard_webber pulls a towel from inside mrs_drake. george_omalley wonders about the towel's origin. richard_webber guesses it's from mrs_drake's surgery five years ago. miranda_bailey comments on the situation and continues to assist richard_webber.

cristina_yang joins richard_webber, miranda_bailey, and george_omalley outside the OR. cristina_yang is surprised about the towel. george_omalley explains that mrs_drake complained of chest pressure, but no one took her seriously. richard_webber emphasizes that the situation is bad for both mrs_drake and the hospital as he leaves. miranda_bailey instructs cristina_yang to gather all information about the initial operation, including who was present and who closed. miranda_bailey tells george_omalley to stay with mrs_drake, who seems to like him. george_omalley asks how long he needs to wait since his shift ends at 6pm. miranda_bailey mentions the party and asks if she's invited, and george_omalley confirms she is. After miranda_bailey leaves, cristina_yang looks at george_omalley with irritation, but george_omalley is unsure what else he could have said.

izzie_stevens is on the phone ordering beer for the party when alex_karev suggests adding local microbrews and bar nuts. izzie_stevens claims she's ordering office supplies but agrees to alex_karev's request and changes the delivery time from 5 to 7. mr_sterman passes by and jokes about being invited to the party if he poops.

derek_shepherd hears his pain patient complaining and having trouble with a nurse as derek_shepherd walks by. frost asks derek_shepherd where derek_shepherd has been. derek_shepherd assures frost they will help and goes to find alex_karev. derek_shepherd criticizes alex_karev for not starting a central line as instructed. alex_karev explains the patient has been in seven hospitals in four months and is an addict. derek_shepherd points out the patient has a 3-lumbar fusion, but alex_karev only sees an addict. derek_shepherd acknowledges the addiction but insists the pain is real. derek_shepherd tells alex_karev to drop the attitude and start the central line.

george_omalley is with mrs_drake, who mentions a handsome, older surgeon told her about a towel left inside her. george_omalley identifies him as richard_webber, their chief. mrs_drake realizes the towel was left after her last surgery and questions how that could happen. george_omalley agrees with mrs_drake's concern.

cristina_yang enters an office and searches through files for information on Mrs. Drake's initial surgery. cristina_yang finds a post-op report naming dr_john_davies as the surgeon and preston_burke as the surgical fellow. cristina_yang takes this information to miranda_bailey and asks what to do next. miranda_bailey advises cristina_yang to keep it private while they figure it out.

meredith_grey is at the nurse's station when derek_shepherd approaches. derek_shepherd notices something is wrong and asks meredith_grey if she's okay. meredith_grey tells derek_shepherd she's just tired from a long procedure. derek_shepherd invites meredith_grey to dinner, but meredith_grey declines. derek_shepherd mentions forgetting about the party, surprising meredith_grey since she hadn't told derek_shepherd about it. derek_shepherd sarcastically thanks meredith_grey for not inviting him and suggests she consider dinner as he leaves.

meredith_grey is then paged and goes to Mrs. Patterson's bed. tyler informs meredith_grey there was swelling over the sternum, followed by heavy bleeding. tyler had already contacted preston_burke. mr_patterson wanted to know if mrs_patterson was dying. meredith_grey asked someone to remove mr_patterson and apply pressure to the wound.

As richard_webber leaves, he complains about mistakes like poking holes in hearts and leaving towels behind. preston_burke tells meredith_grey he will talk to mr_patterson and advises meredith_grey to review the history and apologize a lot. meredith_grey's job is at risk.

meredith_grey is reviewing the chart with cristina_yang and george_omalley. meredith_grey mentions she has to meet with the chief tomorrow morning and might be expelled from the program. george_omalley believes meredith_grey won't be expelled, while cristina_yang thinks mr_patterson might sue. cristina_yang questions why meredith_grey informed preston_burke. george_omalley says he advised meredith_grey not to tell preston_burke. meredith_grey's phone rings, and she says she needs to answer it, sarcastically thanking cristina_yang and george_omalley for their support.

izzie_stevens arrives with coffee, a banana, and chips, mentioning that beer will arrive at 7 pm and some floor nurses are bringing wine. cristina_yang is annoyed that izzie_stevens invited nurses, and george_omalley asks if izzie_stevens got meredith_grey's approval. izzie_stevens insists a few more people won't matter, saying a party is a party. cristina_yang agrees, adding that a bigger party means less time for bad sex with her hockey player. izzie_stevens tells cristina_yang to stop, claiming she and hank have great sex frequently and might even have sex during the party. cristina_yang laughs, and george_omalley reminds cristina_yang to check with meredith_grey. izzie_stevens mentions that hank needs to see doctors can have fun and aren't just workaholics. cristina_yang disagrees, which annoys izzie_stevens, while george_omalley plays with a glove.

meredith_grey is on the phone, confirming a notary will arrive at 6:30, along with a doctor to verify her mother's mental state. meredith_grey asks if she needs anything besides her license and checkbook, confirms the time again, and ends the call. derek_shepherd joins meredith_grey, having overheard. meredith_grey thinks derek_shepherd means her call and tries to cover, but derek_shepherd refers to the heart issue and asks if she wants to discuss it. meredith_grey says they are adults but questions when that happened and how to stop it as she leaves.

cristina_yang puts a patient chart back while preston_burke is working at the nurse's station. cristina_yang and preston_burke greet each other awkwardly. cristina_yang mentions the heart graft complication. preston_burke says it was manageable. cristina_yang walks away, feeling doubtful.

alex_karev and derek_shepherd are in jerry_frost's room. alex_karev and derek_shepherd tell jerry_frost they know he's there to get drugs because of his addiction and advise him to go home and seek help.

meredith_grey goes to the notary, but her mother, experiencing an Alzheimer's episode, won't sign the house documents. meredith_grey pleads with her mother to focus and sign. The notary's secretary informs meredith_grey that they can't complete the deal that day and suggests she return when her mother is clear-headed. meredith_grey becomes frustrated and leaves angrily.

cristina_yang notices miranda_bailey and preston_burke talking. cristina_yang realizes miranda_bailey is giving preston_burke the files about the surgery where a sponge was left inside mrs_drake. preston_burke looks at the files, concerned.

meredith_grey arrives home and finds a party happening there. At the party, cristina_yang asks miranda_bailey for updates on mrs_drake's case. miranda_bailey advises cristina_yang not to get involved.

derek_shepherd looks at jerry_frost's CT scan. derek_shepherd asks izzie_stevens and alex_karev to identify what they see. izzie_stevens and alex_karev notice a subdural hemorrhage, and derek_shepherd says they must operate right away. derek_shepherd asks izzie_stevens if she was supposed to leave or if she wants to stay for the surgery. izzie_stevens says she wants to stay.

At the party, meredith_grey sees george_omalley and asks about izzie_stevens. meredith_grey scolds george_omalley because the party was meant to be a small gathering to meet her boyfriend. meredith_grey says meredith_grey can't handle the situation, and george_omalley offers to make everyone leave. derek_shepherd, izzie_stevens, and alex_karev are in surgery with jerry_frost. alex_karev mentions alex_karev's father was addicted to heroin.

hank waits outside the hospital for izzie_stevens. hank and izzie_stevens kiss when they meet, and izzie_stevens talks about the surgery. hank mentions hank didn't want a big party and doesn't care to meet izzie_stevens's coworkers. izzie_stevens reminds hank that hank didn't mind meeting her colleagues when she was a model. hank points out that izzie_stevens used to attend her parties back then. izzie_stevens insists her life is different now, and her patients are her priority. meredith_grey is outside the house, drunk, and notices derek_shepherd waiting by a car. meredith_grey and derek_shepherd start flirting while discussing tequila. They kiss and have sex in the car. miranda_bailey sees them from outside.

meredith_grey attends a meeting while george_omalley, izzie_stevens, and cristina_yang bet on the discussion's outcome. meredith_grey talks to richard_webber, taking responsibility for the previous day's events. meredith_grey mentions mrs_patterson's condition, who still weighs 100 pounds, as a key factor. mrs_patterson's muscle mass, including the heart, has reduced due to weight loss. richard_webber believes this explains the heart tearing after a minor impact. meredith_grey informs george_omalley, izzie_stevens, and cristina_yang she wasn't fired and will be monitored for a month. miranda_bailey tells cristina_yang that preston_burke planned to reveal the secret about mrs_drake's case and was waiting for the right time, as "information is power."
